category: news
title: "An AI Nightmare Has Arrived for Twitter — And the FBI"
excerpt: "So-called “revenge porn,” explicit material obtained by hacking or shared in confidence with someone who makes it available to others without the subject’s consent, is hardly a novel crime among adolescents. But this time, the images were startlingly different. Though they looked realistic, they had been created with a generative AI program."
